tr.td:
This is an abstract type. Child types: AcceptanceReview, ActivityExecution, ActivityOutcomeObservation, Barrier, CareDeliveryResource, CarePlanManifestation, CarePlanPatient, CareTeam, CareTeamMember, Communication, CommunicationThread, Concern, Goal, Guideline, HealthRisk, Modification, OutcomeReview, PlannedActivity, Preference, ProtectiveFactor, ReconciliationAct, ReconciliationLog, ResourceRequirement
